skills.title: Back-End
skills.description: Python, Java, C++, C#, Javascript, R, SQL

portfolio.title: Android and Dragons 5th
portfolio.description: Utilizing the android mobile development platform, I led my team to create a mobile dungeons and dragons character creator. This was complete with a mobile menu to fill in the blocks of a character sheet and export it as a pdf file. This was made using Java and xml

portfolio.title: Cloud Keys
portfolio.description: My capstone project from my senior year at CSUCI, a completely cloud-based secure password manager. This was created using all AWS tools to facilitate a Node JS and HTML back-end. In the end I Created a webapp password locker hosted on AWS Elastic Beanstalk using an EC2 instance based on the test sim within AWS.

portfolio.title: CSUCI Game Jam 2021
portfolio.description: Game Developed during the CSUCI Game Jam 2021 over a 24 hour period. The challenge was open to those who have no previous expierence developing games in unity, thus tasking us with learning unity and C++ within the framework. I developed the physics and map boundaries.
